subsystems_found.name: Testing Subsystem
subsystems_found.summary: Includes various test files for different modules of the project.

subsystems_found.name: Sandbox
subsystems_found.summary: A folder containing experimental or example code that does not belong to any of the core components of the system.

improvement_opportunities.description: Identify and optimize performance bottlenecks in the central agent module.
Investigate command-line interactions for potential security vulnerabilities.
Review the implementation details of tools offered to ensure they adhere to a clean and maintainable design pattern.
Expand test coverage for new files by creating test cases in an organized fashion within the tests directory.
